content.rendered:
Directed by Pushpdeep Bhardwaj.

Written by Pradipta De.

Cast Amala Paul (Amna Parvez). Amrita Puri (Anju). Zarina Wahab (Rukhsar). Uday Chandra (Watchman). Saurabh Sachdeva (Jagmohan Seth). Paras Priyadarshan (Ganesh). Madan Deodhar (Abdul). Naina Sareen (Mary). Bhavesh Babani (Little shankar). Aalekh Kapoor (Vinod Kumar)

Language Hindi.

Producers Mukesh Bhatt. Sakshi Bhatt. Jyoti Deshpande. Kumkum Saigal. Sahil Saigal. Mahesh Bhatt.

Production Jio Studios. Vishresh Entertainment.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status On Going (2022–)
